encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Sixteen Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of California, Los Angeles. Summary in DA 63 (2002-2003) p. 161-A. - 8 literary texts: Homer's Iliad M [= P. Oxy. LXXI, 4816]; Sophocles' Oedipus Coloneus; Thucydides' Histories, Books vi and viii [addendum to P. Oxy. XIX, 3451]; 3 pieces of unidentified new literature (lyrics, hexameters, text with musical notations [= P. Oxy. LXIX, 4709-4710; 4713]). - 8 documents: loan of wheat [= P. Oxy. LXXI, 4826]; 3 private letters; promise to appear in court; 2 petitions; memorandum to a symmachus.
